title: Switched ISP and ping went from 30 to 250
body: I started playing in S6 and my main role was ADC, during off season I played a lot of top and switched up my playstyle a bit maining Riven. I recently switched ISP and now have pretty high ping, I do fine when solo laning and pushing but clearly Riven does not work well with high ping. What are some good champs to use for high ping (200+) that can just solo push top lane all game? I know a lot of people say don't even play ranked but ive put a lot of time and money into this game to not play. Just have to adapt to it so any feedback helps. Thanks

replies.body:
Since switching ISP's was the only changing factor you mentioned here, you'll want to reach out to your ISP's technical support team so they can look into this. ISP's control most of the factors that decide your latency (ping), so reaching out to them would be a great idea!

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thank you for replying, I called them and they are sending a technician out to re-install since I called them out on all of the nonsense they were trying to tell me. Ill try to post back and let everyone know what exactly the problem was just incase someone else has the same problem.
